name: Talshard
description:
You awaken in a mysterious world plagued with strange portals.
Embark on a journey in this turn-based adventure RPG as you unravel the story and explore themes of fear and self-doubt.

Battle uniquely crafted enemies!
These strange creatures each serve a different role in combat. Defeat them and they may drop a rune or two... which can be used to unlock new skills!


Passive abilities and enchantments!
Further augment your strategy with a range of boosts and passive abilities. Experiment with different combinations and find a style that fits you!


Explore a handcrafted world!
Explore nostalgic pixel art environments as you unravel the short (~3h), story-driven world, featuring an original chiptune-esque soundtrack - all developed by one person!


New Game Modes to add replayability!
Unlock new game modes and randomize gameplay elements to shake up your experience. Will you be caught surprised?
